Why Rune?

Built for developers who want to automate their workflow without sacrificing control.

‚è±Ô∏è

Intelligent Time Tracking

Automatic project detection via Git, package.json, go.mod. Session persistence across restarts.

üîï

Cross-Platform Focus Mode

Automatic Do Not Disturb on macOS, Windows, and Linux. 6+ desktop environments supported.

ü§ñ

Ritual Automation

Custom commands that run when you start/stop work. YAML configuration with error handling.

üîÑ

Migration Tools

Import data from Watson and Timewarrior with project mapping and dry-run preview.

üìä

Beautiful Reporting

Colored CLI output with themes. Daily/weekly summaries and project breakdowns.

üõ°Ô∏è

Privacy-First

All data stored locally. No cloud dependencies. Optional telemetry with full transparency.

Quick Start

Get up and running in minutes

# Install via curl (macOS/Linux)
$ curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ferg-cod3s/rune/main/install.sh | bash

# Or via Homebrew
$ brew install --cask ferg-cod3s/tap/rune

# Interactive setup
$ rune init --guided

# Start tracking (auto-detects project, enables DND)
$ rune start

# View your daily report
$ rune report today
View detailed installation guide ‚Üí
